column4: can grub be installed from a ubuntu 9.10 live disk?   With previous ubuntu disks you could "sudo grub" and quickly install only grub, but on the 9.10 disk it says "grub: command not found"
no grub2 doesnt work that way   you may want to go to #grub   channel for more indepth info
is it more difficult than before?
it is way different than grub legacy  so in that respect it is  a bit more difficult  because of that
